nodes.bodyText:
There is an agreed contract that all deployment phases and all processor ids are defined in Phase object.
Further more someone in the future might define the same DU processor ID in WildFly Core and it would collide. Please keep the contract.
Remove this and wait for WildFly Core upgrade.

+1 in my recent DUP refactorings I have found a number of cases where the IDs used in WildFly don't get passed back to WildFly Core where we say we will come back to it later.
Please get a PR raised against WildFly Core and we should be able to get it merged quickly.
